descriptor.name: Axe Body Spray Perfume for Men, Signature Champion & Dark Temptation 154ml (Pack Of 2)
descriptor.short_desc: About this productThis kit Includes:Axe Body Spray Perfume for MenSignature Champion & Dark Temptation 154ml (Pack Of 2). •  The World’s # 1 Male Deodorant, Axe presents ‘Axe Signature’ - a range ...
descriptor.long_desc: About this productThis kit Includes:Axe Body Spray Perfume for MenSignature Champion & Dark Temptation 154ml (Pack Of 2). •  The World’s # 1 Male Deodorant, Axe presents ‘Axe Signature’ - a range of premium body perfumes with 0% gas.  •  Designed by the world's leading perfumers, Axe Signature body perfumes are concentrated with 3X more perfume.  •  These body perfumes are not only stronger, they also last longer, helping you make an unforgettable impression when it matters the most.  •  This combo pack contains one unit of Axe Signature Champion body perfume - Get ready to conquer the world with this unique fragrance with warm woody notes blended with fresh bergamot and lemon to create a strong and long-lasting perfume.  •  The bold aroma of this crisp, citrusy fragrance will keep you feeling fresh all-day long and one unit of Axe Signature Dark Temptation - Enriched by the mischievous interplay of unique seductive ingredients, this long-lasting fragrance has been crafted for a refreshing beat in Axe's iconic style. •  Powered by the unique intense fragrance of dark chocolate that leans toward seductive bliss, designed for the metrosexual man.  •  Check out the complete range of Axe products including Axe Deodorants, Axe Ticket range of pocket perfumes, Axe shaving creams, Axe after shave lotions etc. and tell us more about your favourite products by leaving us a review."  Storage Direction (e.g. Condition)  • "Keep it in a cool place away from heat or sunlight. Do not expose it to temperature exceeding 50 degrees Celsius.

@ondc/org/statutory_reqs_packaged_commod.manufacturer_or_packer_address: Unilever House, B. D. Sawant Marg, Chakala, Andheri (E), Mumbai - 400099
